text: The common crepe mirtle was introduced in South Carolina by Andre Michaux. This multistemmed shrub with crepe-like texture petals, and diverse colors is resistant to frosts. The genus is dedicated to Magnus von Lagerstroem, who supplied Linnaeus plant he collected. ==Taxonomy== *Lagerstroemia indiana (L.)Pers. ==Other websites== *Flora of China 13, 277 *The Craple myrtle Category:Myrtales
title: Crepe myrtle
